tool_description: Validates app store listings and content against platform policies, guidelines, and regulatory requirements to prevent rejections.

platform.description: Platform to check compliance for: ios, android, or both

error_messages: Invalid platform: Platform must be 'ios', 'android', or 'both'.
Policy violation detected: Content violates platform policies.
Inappropriate content rating: Content doesn't match declared age rating.
Trademark violation: App title or description may contain trademarked terms.
Category mismatch: App content doesn't align with selected category.
Keyword policy violation: Keywords contain prohibited terms.
usage: Provide platform, app_title, app_description, app_category, keywords, and content_rating. Optionally include screenshot_urls for visual content validation. Returns compliance status and violation details.

compliance_status.description: Whether the content passes all compliance checks

recommended_changes.description: Specific recommendations to address compliance issues
